newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: RESEARCH ALERT-Ciadea started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Ciadea started as buy.

text.p: ING Barings said in report on Friday it initiated Argentine car maker Ciadea SA with a buy rating.
-- ING said it set a 12-month price target of 5.5 pesos on the stock, which closed Thursday at 4.55 pesos.

-- "Despite the competitive market, with players such as VW (Volkswagen) , Fiat and Ford taking market share, we expect Ciadea to perform better than Sevel in terms of domestic competition and view Renault's Brazil plant positively for more longer term export growth," the report said.
-- The report added that Ciadea's prospects were brighter because of Renault's increased participation in the company and the strategy of boosting involvement in the Mercosur market.
-- Ciadea makes Renault models under license in Argentina.
